"Deirdre": "Hey, ain't seen you around here before. Newly arrived to Central City, are ya?"
"You should come see me after you get some notches on your belt. Might be as I can teach you a thing or two."
"I'm the head instructor for hybrid combat."
"I've heard about you. Making quite the name for yourself lately. I like that."
"Wanna learn about hybrid combat? I can teach you."
"Oh well... Let me know if you change your mind."
"No special treatment here, you start from the basics like everyone else."
"By the time I'm done with you, you'll fight as naturally as you breathe."
"You should have learned about the importance of Class Skills from your basic training."
"I really want to see you go places. Devote yourself to the machinations of combat and take Braver to the next level."
